# habistats: Habitat Statistics

Summarize and visualize the statistics of spatial data.
Ecology and evolutionary biology are the main targets of this package,
and utilites to handle IUCN Red List Spatial Data and KÃ¶ppen-Geiger
Climate Classification are provided. But the core part of the package
is data-agnostic, and can be used with any spatial data, even if they
are not related to habitat or biology.


## Installation

You can install the development version of habistats like so:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("heavywatal/habistats")
```
